title: Arcadia in Avernus
creator: Will Lillibridge
source: Librivox recording of a public-domain text
description: Unhappy wife leaves marriage of convenience for another man, the couple running away to the Dakota prairie to set up housekeeping. All seems romantically well... until the ex shows up. Surprisingly modern (if a little theatrical) novella from the early 1900's. From the posthumous collection of Lillibridge short stories, A Breath of Prairie, 1911. (Summary by BellonaTimes ) Narrated by BellonaTimes. For further information, including links to online text, reader information, RSS feeds, CD cover or other formats (if available), please go to the LibriVox catalog pagefor this recording. For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org . M4B format available
subject: romance; adultery; prairie; audio
